creator: simon.perreault@viagenie.ca
text:
How to reproduce:

$ echo 'OPTIONS *' | nc example.com 80
$ echo 'OPTIONS /' | nc example.com 80

Expected result: 200 response as specified in RFC 2616 section 9.2.
Actual result: 500 response.
That's not an HTTP request.  If you send a valid request, it works.
creator: nick@webthing.com
